channel.title: FLF - The Comedian Next Door
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: TCND: Smartest Man Improv Game (Honey and Pepper) [The Comedian Next Door]
item.description:
Hey, Neighbor! The McKinney Kids are at the table for another improv game.   They answer some important questions--just one word at a time. We love laughing with these crazy characters...

How do you know you've had a great birthday party?

What's the best way to get rid of hornets?

How do you make a birdhouse?

Find out on today's episode.

Email the Comedian's Family at nextdoor@johnbranyan.com
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Riff 11 Comedy Conversation [The Comedian Next Door]
item.description: The gang gets nostalgic about cars, laughing over how we remember them more than people’s names. We joke about using cars as nicknames—hilarious or creepy? You decide. We also dive into the quirks of self-checkout machines and their fake gratitude, wishing they’d just give us a sarcastic “thanks.” Then, it’s all about weird food combos, like ice cream on hot stuff (why?), fried ice cream, and the genius idea of a cookie dough caulking gun. We wrap things up with a silly take on the phonetic alphabet and Morse code.
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: TCND: Bad Spelling and ADHD (Sit and Listen) [The Comedian Next Door]
item.description:
You can't just sit and listen to a podcast, Pkarlgh!  The Podcast Ninja has spoken.   Turns out, all of our attention spans are shorter than we'd like...   What's the minimum amount of time you have to concentrate on something for it to count as "focus?"

Then: Joe and Luke both have the sort of study habits that make their wives craaaaaazy. 

Later: Play "guess that word" with Emmi's spelling test.  

Contact the Comedian's family by emailing nextdoor@johnbranyan.com.
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Riff 10 Comedy Conversation [The Comedian Next Door]
item.description: The gang, with special guest Curtis Crow, dives into the hilarious transition from young to old—think reading glasses, sensible shoes, and pharmacy apps. We also chat about the wacky world of Guinness World Records and the absurdity of some titles. Then, we tackle the ultimate culture clash: marriage. Cue the awkward gift-giving scenarios with white elephants and secret Santas, and brace yourself for the laugh-out-loud idea of the "Joelympics"—where regular folks compete in everyday tasks like grocery bag hauling and car packing. We wrap it up with some honest family talk, exploring the quirks of communication and the art of not offending Aunt Mildred.
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC
